column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Have been going to Cafe Ba Ba Reba since they opened. Never been disappointed! They've been open for all these years because the food is of the top quality
column2: the service is superb and it's a nice clean place. This time we had the garlic shrimp
column4: beef empanadas and short ribs. The short ribs are some the best you'll ever have. The only thing better than the food was the service. Our server Tatum
column5: could not have been more attentive and sweeter! She great! Try this establishment
